clinical_history: Follow-up imaging for known pulmonary nodule.
findings: Pleural effusion on the right upper lobe side, moderate in size.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in right upper lobe.

Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in right upper lobe.
recommendations: Consider CT or HRCT for detailed evaluation.
